thread.title: Crenshaw, Kite set for Champions Tour event in San Antonio
thread.title_full: Crenshaw, Kite set for Champions Tour event in San Antonio

author: Doug Smith
title: Crenshaw, Kite set for Champions Tour event in San Antonio
text:
Crenshaw, Kite set for Champions Tour event in San Antonio 6:32 p.m. Wednesday, Oct. 14, 2015 | Filed in: Sports Comments 0 ﻿ 
The Austin trio of Ben Crenshaw, Tom Kite and Wes Short Jr. will be in the field when the PGA Champions Tour sets up for the San Antonio Championship, which runs Friday through Sunday at the TPC San Antonio-ATT Canyons Course. 
Crenshaw, 63, and Kite, 65, play a limited schedule these days. This will be only Crenshaw’s seventh Champions Tour appearance of the season. It’s the 14th for Kite.
